ygData.messageBody:
> But when the
> expansion comes out, the new zones will/should contain the new high level
> mobs/items (geared toward the 50+ player). Vox/Nagafen and plane loot
> should remain geared towards the 45-50 level players (of course they can add
> new dragons in the expansion geared towards the 50+ players

I think this is exactly what Verant will do...since to do otherwise would
alienate current high-levels and low-levels alike. Let's pretend that the new
level limit is 75. If Verant raises the Dragons and Planes to level 75, then
people will fight for 25 levels to kill the stuff they killed 25 levels
earlier.

The key for Verant is to come up with new mobs and zones for the 50+ crowd
that is good enough to keep them from going back on Dragon raids and such.
That way, each new crop of level 50s can experience the fun of a Dragon raid
and keep going from there.
